Ingredients.5: 2 (12.5 fl oz) cans diced chicken, drained

Ingredients.6: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup

Ingredients.7: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.8: 2 (16 ounce) cans refrigerated biscuit dough (such as Pillsbury Grands!®)

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray.

Directions.2: Pour mixed vegetables into a microwave-safe bowl. Add water. Heat in the microwave until warmed through, 1 to 3 minutes. Drain.

Directions.3: Spray a skillet with cooking spray and heat over medium heat. Add onion and cook until soft, about 3 minutes. Add mixed vegetables, diced chicken, condensed soup, salt, and pepper. Cook and stir until filling is heated through, 3 to 5 minutes more.

Directions.4: Open biscuits and flatten each circle out with your fingertips. Place a portion of filling on one half of a circle and fold the other half over. Press edges with a fork to seal closed. Place mini pie carefully onto the prepared baking sheet. Repeat with remaining biscuits and filling.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until the outsides are golden, 30 to 35 minutes.
